ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Fashion Police
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Go for a Lumberjack s cap, AC 12 +3 stamina and it looks like leather, about 60-80pp I think, but worth it for the helm-free look. Tsengu [Non-text
ygData.messageBody:
> I have mostly banded, plus bronze pants, gauntlets, and helm. The
> Dwarven tunic blends well enough with the tunic. But, I really hate
> the look of the bronze helm on wood elf females. It totally covers my
> face. The banded has a nice egyptian look, but the bronze looks like
> I'm wearing a small trash can on my head. I may just give up the
> extra AC and get a banded helm instead.

Go for a Lumberjack's cap, AC 12 +3 stamina and it looks like leather, about
60-80pp I think, but worth it for the helm-free look.

Tsengu


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
